title: Harajuku Master
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Haaah~, whenever you come to Harajuku, it just makes your eyes get so fixated (gachi gachi) on stuff, huh~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ahaha, because you’re Chikacchi~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Waah! That turned out to be a pun! Ahaha, Chika’s eyes go twitch twitch (chika chika).<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Are your eyes twitching that much? That means it’s bright, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Hmm, it’s more like.... “There’s too much information to handle”, I think? There are tons of shops and goods, and I would like to see them all, but I just don’t know where to start.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ai guess you’re right. Ah, then do you want to go to the backside of Harajuku?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>The backside of Harajuku?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>It’s like.... A path with fewer people and stores? We can relax while looking around, and there are lots of second-hand clothes shops there too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I see! I want to go there~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Okay! There’s also a good cafe there, so let’s eat some pancakes~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
